worldview.label: Worldview
worldview.title1: A Space Cat Who Came to Earth
story: there was a planet called Meow Planet where cats lived
It was a special place where they lived on various {emotions} as energy
Then one day, a small crisis came to Meow Planet
The emotional energy started to decrease little by little
So the cats of Meow Planet came to {Earth} looking for energy
One day, a space cat Ritty came to our doorstep,
How about it, will you become Ritty's butler?

meta.title: Ritty - Talking Cat Virtual Pet | AI Tamagotchi
meta.description: Meet Ritty, the space cat looking for a butler! A modern Tamagotchi experience. Chat with your cute cat, feed it, dress it up, and play mini-games. If you need healing in your busy life, become Ritty's butler.
meta.keywords: Ritty, talking cat, virtual pet, Tamagotchi, AI cat, AI chat, AI friend, pet game, healing app, cat game, space cat
meta.ogTitle: Ritty - Talking Cat Virtual Pet | AI Tamagotchi
